website_summaries.verdict: The Saucony Shadow Original is a classic running shoe that can be worn every day. It possesses eye-catching retro style wear, a combination of premium and durable materials, and a price range that is commended by many reviewers. With first-rate comfort and support it provides to wearers, this shoe is highly suggested to be a part of every sneaker fan’s closet.
pros: Lots of fans describe the Saucony Shadow Original as comfortable
Various buyers praise this pair's light and breathable cushioning
A number of reviewers note that the Saucony Shadow Original sneaker is much more sturdy and substantial than other Saucony sneaker designs
Many reviewers say that the style of the Saucony Shadow Original men’s and women’s sneakers is remarkable
Most admire it for its sweet retro design
Some users say that the ankle and arch support are brilliant
The brand offers this in multiple colorways
A handful of Saucony Shadow Original reviews commend the lush suede on its upper
Some users who are suffering from rheumatoid arthritis, hammertoes, calluses, etcetera highly recommend this pair to everyone
Most consumers applaud the sneaker for its affordable price point
cons: A handful of buyers say that the workmanship done on the Saucony Shadow Original is not that superb due to some stitches coming undone on the upper
The laces are a little bit short, according to a couple of buyers
Several consumers share that the color of the Saucony Shadow Original shoe is a little bit lighter in person than on websites

customer_reviews.title: Old friend of a shoe
customer_reviews.text: This product is a replacement for the Saucony Originals Men's Jazz Sneaker I had ordered by mistake. The Shadow is a much higher quality than the Jazz and the fit is much more accurate. I would suggest ordering 1/2 size larger than your normal shoe size.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pulaski

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable shoes on the market.
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable shoe in the world. This shoe fits me perfectly, as always. I have been wearing Saucony for more than forty years and have never been disappointed. I have a small foot so finding my size is always a challenge but not so with Saucony. You can be certain that these shoes are made with Great attention to quality. They are definitely a five star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Alan P. Damiano

customer_reviews.title: Great yellow sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for the price. Arrived as expected. Been looking for a pair of yellow sneakers and jumped on these. I wear 10.5 (US) men and that's what I ordered and they fit as expected. No issues with the shoes or seller. Will be back to buy other colors.
customer_reviews.author: Stylez

customer_reviews.title: Comfort & Style
customer_reviews.text: Love how these fit. I have 3 pairs of different colors. They keep my feet cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: BillyC37

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, definitely not a shoe for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a little tight even in Wide. Definitely not my most comfortable pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sportek for life

customer_reviews.title: Saucony sneakers fit to size.
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers fit better than most brands that I've tried. That is the most important factor in buying shoes, especially over the internet. They also have an attractive design.
customer_reviews.author: Bill from North Texas.

customer_reviews.title: These run a full size too small
customer_reviews.text: These are one of my most comfortable pair of sneakers. I did a walking tour in DC and my feet were fine!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Me and my boyfriend got many compliments while wearing them!! They fit perfect and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Drake

customer_reviews.title: You should probably buy a half size bigger
customer_reviews.text: I usually get a 9 1/2 in shoes but these were a little too small.
customer_reviews.author: Josh cole

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Perfect as always. Would order again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes - good price
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Fit as expected. The color surprisingly goes with almost everything. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis J.

customer_reviews.title: Would but again
customer_reviews.text: Personal use and I liked it. Fit perfect and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Good Looking Shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking sneaker. They are comfortable and the material is quality. Great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: ActiveDad

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the Saucony brand. Every sneaker I own from this company is so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: This Classic Style Brings Back GREAT Memories of the Good Ole Days!
customer_reviews.text: I grew up in the 80's and 90's and never had a pair of these until recently and I LOVE THEM!! They are extremely comfortable and fit true to my size (11.5). I get lots of compliments on these Sauconys too!
customer_reviews.author: PinarelloRider

customer_reviews.title: My black and gold go to.
customer_reviews.text: I love the colors and the style of these. I can't say it enough how comfortable Sauconys are. My shoes arrived the very next day and I am very happy thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

product_meta.title: Saucony Men's Shadow Original Sneaker
product_meta.description: The shadow original is a staple silhouette in Saucony history. First introduced in 1985 as a performance trainer, The shadow original still has that same comfort and stability of the original. We included mesh, nylon and that marshmallowy eva you've come to know and love, all in one fashion sneaker. The shadow original is an icon in our lineup that will please the originator of any age.
feature_bullets: Padded collar and tongue delivers a comfy fit
Comfortable fabric lining and a cushioned EVA sockliner for all-day comfort
Traditional lace up front provides optimum fit
"Marshmallowy" EVA midsole cushions and absorbs shock
TPU heel piece provides extra support
